Commentary: Ehsan Adil to Bismillah Khan, no run, beauty to start. Fullish length on off, swerving away prodigiously. Beaten comprehensively.
Ehsan Adil to Bismillah Khan, no run, full on off, pushed back to the bowler
Ehsan Adil to Bismillah Khan, FOUR, starts off at middle and leg, doesn't swing too much and BK picks it off his pads with a neat flick. In the air but wide of square leg
Ehsan Adil to Bismillah Khan, no run, another jaffa. Good length outside off and some away shape takes the ball past the outside edge
Ehsan Adil to Bismillah Khan, 1 leg bye, starts too straight again and it pings off the thigh pad to fine leg
Ehsan Adil to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, swatted to the midwicket stand. Easily done. Shortish delivery that sits up for Shehzad to slap to the boundary.
Zafar Gohar to Bismillah Khan, no run, shortish outside off, some turn. Smashed to cover
Zafar Gohar to Bismillah Khan, SIX, slogged away over midwicket. Flat on off, Bismillah gets down early and thwacks it away over midwicket. Just clears the fielder at the boundary
Zafar Gohar to Bismillah Khan, no run, short and wide, slapped to cover

Zafar Gohar to Bismillah Khan, FOUR, nice stroke. Short outside off, Bismillah gives himself room and lofts the ball over cover. Nice stroke, after not finding the gap previously, he decides to go over it.
Zafar Gohar to Bismillah Khan, FOUR, driven past mid-on for four more. Tossed up on middle, BK powers the drive in the air, but wide of mid-on
Zafar Gohar to Bismillah Khan, FOUR, short and wide and Gohar is punished. Scythed in the gap at point for another boundary. Great start this for Quetta

Ehsan Adil to Ahmed Shehzad, OUT, given. Hmm, interesting decision. Good length delivery on leg, Shehzad shuffles across but misses his flick. The umpire raises the finger in a hurry but was that too high or sliding down? Replays aren't conclusive, Shehzad has to go anyway.
Wicket: ['Ahmed Shehzad lbw b Ehsan Adil 4 (2b 1x4 0x6) SR: 200.00']

Commentary: Ehsan Adil to Pietersen, FOUR, too strong there. Poor delivery, full on KP's pads and he brings out a lot of power on his flick. In the air and over midwicket
Ehsan Adil to Pietersen, FOUR, terrible bowling to KP. Very full on middle and leg, Pietersen just helps it on its way past short fine leg for four. Runs leaking at the moment

Ehsan Adil to Pietersen, FOUR, and again. He adjusts his length, on off. But Pietersen shuffles across and picks it off, in the gap through mid-on and midwicket. Four more. Those were manufactured runs, great batting.
Ehsan Adil to Pietersen, FOUR, and another. Shortish delivery on middle and leg, Pietersen clobbers the pull to the fine leg boundary. Got there extremely quickly.

Ehsan Adil to Pietersen, FOUR, five in a row. An absolutely shocking delivery. Would have been wide of Kp ignore it, but he didn't. Tickled it muscularly past short fine leg for the the fifth consecutive boundary of the over. Eventful over.
Cooper to Bismillah Khan, FOUR, he starts off with an awful delivery. Short on leg and Bismillah nurdles it fine to the fine leg boundry
Cooper to Bismillah Khan, no run, fullish outside off, Bismillah feigns backing away before coming back to his normal stance only to get beaten
Cooper to Bismillah Khan, FOUR, clobbered. gets a length delivery in his half and he belts it back over the bowler's head for another boundary

Cooper to Bismillah Khan, FOUR, another boundary. What is happening here? Full and wide outside off, BK goes for a lofted drive but gets a thick outside edge which flies to the third man fence. 11 fours in the last 13.

Cooper to Bismillah Khan, no run, big big noise there. Not given. Good length outside off, Bismillah tries to guide it down to third man but gets a feather through to the keeper. Not given, but he definitely hit that.
Cooper to Bismillah Khan, FOUR, and that will be four more. This was the shot he attempted. Good length outside off, worked away with a dab past short third man for four.
Bravo to Pietersen, 1 run, low full toss on leg, pushed to long-on
Bravo to Bismillah Khan, 1 run, short delivery on middle, pulled to deep square leg for a run
Bravo to Pietersen, 1 run, slower delivery, pushed down to long-on. Such was the destruction in the first four overs, that these two are happy with singles chasing 202
Bravo to Bismillah Khan, 1 run, dabbed to third man. Single.

Bravo to Pietersen, FOUR, no more singles. Short delivery by Bravo on middle, well-directed bouncer. KP is hustled by the pace and just swivel pulls to the backward square leg boundary. Just like that, eight of the over
Bravo to Pietersen, 1 run, yorker attempted, low full toss. Pushed to long-on
Cooper to Pietersen, no run, superb shot but he finds the fielder at extra cover. Full and wide, Pietersen cracks a drive
Cooper to Pietersen, no run, low full toss on middle, hurriedly driven to cover
Cooper to Pietersen, 1 run, ooh, close with a direct hit. Full and wide, mis-timed to mid-off for a quick run. Nicely done from KP, called immediately.
Cooper to Bismillah Khan, 1 run, clipped to wide long-on for a run.
Cooper to Pietersen, 1 run, nice yorker from Cooper on off, dug out to point for one
Cooper to Bismillah Khan, 1 run, full on off, patted into the covers for a run to round off a magnificent Powerplay for Quetta
Delport to Bismillah Khan, FOUR, four more. Full and wide from Delport, Bismillah guides the cut past point for four. Not quite all of it, but enough.
Delport to Bismillah Khan, 1 run, slower delivery on off, pushed to long-on
Delport to Pietersen, 1 run, very high full toss on middle, another one. Swatted to deep midwicket
Delport to Bismillah Khan, FOUR, lovely shot that is. Powers the drive through the covers. Leaves a blazing trail as that ball left the bat. What a fifty this has been
Delport to Bismillah Khan, 1 run, calmly worked to deep midwicket
Delport to Pietersen, 1 run, yorker. Driven to long-on
Zohaib Khan to Pietersen, 1 run, another full toss. Staggering number of full tosses. On leg and KP is quick through the flick. Leading edge to cover
Zohaib Khan to Bismillah Khan, 1 run, brilliant fielding there by Azhar. Short and wide outside off, BK lays into a cut through point but Azhar dives to stop it. Almost effects a run-out
Zohaib Khan to Pietersen, no run, short and wide, the cut is laced to point
Zohaib Khan to Pietersen, no run, full on off, pushed back to the bowler
Zohaib Khan to Pietersen, 1 run, full and wide, no spin. Drilled to deep cover
Zohaib Khan to Bismillah Khan, 1 run, fired in on off, chopped towards point for one. Good over from Zohaib
Bravo to Bismillah Khan, 1 run, slower offcutter, yorker. Stabbed to point
Bravo to Pietersen, 1 run, low full toss on middle, drilled to long-on
Bravo to Bismillah Khan, 1 leg bye, short down leg, off the thigh pad to short fine leg

Bravo to Pietersen, OUT, slower ball has deceived KP. Big wicket that. KP is way too early through his shot and ends up skewing the ball in the air to long-on. Umar Akmal settles underneath it. Big wicket that

Bravo to Bismillah Khan, OUT, another wicket. The match-turning over. Good bumper on middle and leg, Bismillah goes for a pull but the ball hurries onto him and he ends up skewing it in the air. Rizwan runs around towards short fine leg and takes it nicely. Both set men gone and this game is open.
Wicket: ['KP Pietersen c Umar Akmal b Bravo 34 (21b 6x4 0x6) SR: 161.90']

Commentary: Bravo to Sangakkara, 1 run, slower delivery down leg, worked down to fine leg for a run
Zohaib Khan to Sangakkara, 1 run, worked to square leg for a run
Wicket: ['Bismillah Khan c †Mohammad Rizwan b Bravo 55 (30b 10x4 1x6) SR: 183.33']

Commentary: Zohaib Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, short on off, cut late to point who makes a good diving stop
Zohaib Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, full on off, tapped to cover for a quick run
Zohaib Khan to Sangakkara, 1 run, tossed up on off, drilled down to long-on
Zohaib Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, short on middle, Sarfraz moves away and cuts powerfully to point. Cooper makes another good stop
Zohaib Khan to Sangakkara, 1 leg bye, comes down does Sanga but Zohaib shortens the length. No spin and Sanga is beaten on the outside edge. Off the pad and maybe a bit of bat towards point
Delport to Sangakkara, no run, shortish and wide outside off, Sanga fails to connect with an attempted cut
Delport to Sangakkara, 2 runs, slower ball on leg, worked in the gap at square leg for a quick brace. Well played
Delport to Sangakkara, 1 run, full on off, heaved away to long-on
Delport to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, inside-halved to midwicket
Delport to Sangakkara, 1 run, another sweep, on the one knee and hit to long-on
Delport to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, yorker outside off, steered to short third man
Zohaib Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, superb shot. Gets down the track, converts it into a full toss and whips the ball in the gap at midwicket. Lovely
Zohaib Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, flat on leg, Sarfraz backs away but cuts to point
Zohaib Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, driven away to cover for a run
Zohaib Khan to Sangakkara, 2 runs, full on off, drilled past the bowler for a couple. Good running from Sarfraz
Zohaib Khan to Sangakkara, FOUR, shot. Very flat and full on middle, Sanga crashes the sweep in the gap at square leg. Great batting
Zohaib Khan to Sangakkara, 2 runs, tossed up outside off, driven away past cover for a brace. Good running
Cooper to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, full on off, nurdled with soft hands towards square leg with soft hands. Two
Cooper to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 leg bye, yorker on leg, off the thigh pad towards fine leg
Cooper to Sangakkara, 2 runs, full on off, drilled over the bowler for a couple. Sanga doing it nicely.
Cooper to Sangakkara, FOUR, superb shot that was. Short on the pads and Sanga helps it on its way past short fine leg for four. Made it look easy
Cooper to Sangakkara, no run, full on off, patted back to the bowler
Cooper to Sangakkara, 1 run, drilled down to long-off for a run
Delport to Sangakkara, FOUR, not a great delivery. Full and wide, Sanga dabs the late cut past point for four. Beautifully played
Delport to Sangakkara, 2 runs, slower ball on off, chipped in the air towards long-on. Another couple.
Delport to Sangakkara, 1 run
Delport to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, placed in the gap at midwicket for another couple. These twos coming easily. Great batting
Delport to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, slower delivery outside off, slogged to long-on
Delport to Sangakkara, FOUR, what a finish to the over. Another slower delivery on middle, Sanga presents the full face of the bat and lofts it over mid-off for four. Races away to the fence.
Bravo to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, low full toss on middle, pushed to long-on
Bravo to Sangakkara, 1 run, fantastic fielding from Bravo. Slower ball on leg, Sanga misses the flick and scampers a leg bye. Bravo runs around, turns around and fires a direct hit. But Sanga is in
Bravo to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, slower ball outside off, patted to point
Bravo to Sangakkara, 1 run, full down leg, worked away to backward square leg for one.
Bravo to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, full on off, drilled to long-off for one
Bravo to Sangakkara, 1 run, yorker on leg, Sanga comes down and hits the ball into the surface and over the bowler for a run. Decent over from Bravo, keeping his side in it
Ehsan Adil to Sangakkara, 1 run, slower ball on middle, swatted away to backward square leg for a run.
Ehsan Adil to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, slogged away in the gap at square leg. Sarfraz backs away, and the bowler follows him. Off the inside half and to the boundary

Ehsan Adil to Sarfraz Ahmed, OUT, bowled im. big moment in the match. Quetta were looking in total control, no need for that stroke. He comes down, looking for the ramp and goes too far. Adil keeps it simple and straight. Sarfraz misses. Adil hits. Lahore have an important strike.
Ehsan Adil to Anwar Ali, 1 run, full on middle, pushed to cover
Ehsan Adil to Sangakkara, no run, full and very wide. Sanga misses his steer. Not called a wide. Hmm.

Ehsan Adil to Sangakkara, OUT, gone. Sanga has to go. What an over, what a comeback. Full on off, Sanga misses his drive. And the ball clatters into the stumps. What a blow that is. They check for a no-ball but he is fine. Adil has the double-strike.
Cooper to Anwar Ali, no run, great yorker on off, dug out back to the bowler
Cooper to Anwar Ali, 1 run, full on off, whacked away to long-on. Just the one
Cooper to Elliott, 1 run, full on middle, worked away to deep midwicket to get off the mark
Cooper to Anwar Ali, 1 run, yorker on off, pushed to long-on
Cooper to Elliott, 2 runs, yorker outside off, guided past point. Elliott races back for the second. Excellent running.

Cooper to Elliott, OUT, oh my. What a terrible delivery. Would have been a wide if Elliott ignored it. He tickled it fine to short fine leg. Adil collects cleanly, but did it carry? Adil draws a box in the air to call for the television replays. Replays seem inconclusive whether it has carried or not. A replay shows it has carried, according to me. Is there too much doubt? No, says the third umpire. It has been given out. The worst ball of the over has the wicket. Another match-turning moment.
Ehsan Adil to Anwar Ali, 1 run, full on off, driven to long-off
Ehsan Adil to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, full on off, superbly driven but straight to cover.

Ehsan Adil to Mohammad Nawaz, OUT, gone. Nawaz goes. Adil gets him. Put in the slot on off, right there for the big hit and Nawaz goes for it but on;ly manages a thin outside edge which is easily held by the keeper.
Ehsan Adil to Mohammad Nabi, 2 runs, nicely hit. Full and wide outside off, scythed away past point for a couple. Good fielding at the boundary
Ehsan Adil to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run, full on off, drilled to long-on
Wicket: ['GD Elliott c Ehsan Adil b Cooper 3 (3b 0x4 0x6) SR: 100.00']

Commentary: Ehsan Adil to Anwar Ali, no run, full outside off, Anwar fails to connect. Beaten. End of an outstanding comeback by Ehsan Adil.
Bravo to Mohammad Nabi, SIX, six. What a start to the over that is. Full outside off, Nabi rushes down and just clobbers it over cover. Clears the boundary by a distance. Pressure on Bravo now
Bravo to Mohammad Nabi, FOUR, four. Wow, what is happening here? Slower ball outside off, Nabi comes down and gets bat on his slice past point for four. Not sure he intended it but in the gap, four.
Bravo to Mohammad Nabi, no run, another slower ball outside off, right in the slot again. Nabi fails to connect. Dot ball
Wicket: ['Mohammad Nawaz (3) c †Mohammad Rizwan b Ehsan Adil 0 (2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00']

Commentary: Bravo to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run, full on off, full toss maybe. Swatted to long-on for a run

Bravo to Anwar Ali, OUT, gone. What an important wicket. Will it matter though because Nabi is back on strike? Another slower ball on off, hit away into the air to long-on. Umar Akmal takes a quality, pressure catch. This pendulum is swinging again
Bravo to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run, worked away to deep midwicket for a run. Nabi wants the strike and he'll get it
Zohaib Khan to Mohammad Nabi, no run, yorker on off, drilled back to the bowler. Zohaib does well. Picks up and removes the stumps, the non-striker is back but.
Zohaib Khan to Mohammad Nabi, FOUR, that will be four. Anticipating that length, gets back in the crease and drills it back to the long-on fence. Great shot.
Zohaib Khan to Mohammad Nabi, SIX, that is six. Short outside off, Nabi stays back and whacks it. Long over the fence. Very predictable stuff.
Zohaib Khan to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run, yorker outside off, a thick inside edge goes to short fine leg for one. Nabi is off strike

Zohaib Khan to Zulfiqar Babar, 1 run, full toss is drilled back to Zohaib who drops a really hard chance. They scamper one as well. He could have stopped the single. If he had taken it, Nabi would not be on strike.

Zohaib Khan to Mohammad Nabi, FOUR, it has gone for four and Nabi has done it for his side. What drama here. Very full and wide outside off, Nabi scythes it away over point. What a game this has been. Zohaib chose to bowl it full and wide, was that the wisest choice? Nabi got under it and found the gap. Bravo, it seemed, ran around and fumbled at the boundary.
Wicket: ['Anwar Ali c Umar Akmal b Bravo 6 (8b 0x4 0x6) SR: 75.00']
